title: Brett Sturgess
text: "Brett Sturgess" was born 16 November 1981 in <a href="Kettering">Kettering</a>, <a href="England">England</a>, Sturgess is a <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player for <a href="Exeter%20Chiefs">Exeter Chiefs</a> in the <a href="Aviva%20Premiership">Aviva Premiership</a> whose position of choice is <a href="Prop%20%28rugby%20union%29">Prop</a>. Sturgess has previously played for Irish side <a href="Connacht%20Rugby">Connacht Rugby</a> and English side <a href="Northampton%20Saints">Northampton Saints</a>. Sturgess joined Exeter in 2007 from Connacht and has become a regular feature in the Exeter squad. Sturgess left the Chiefs at the end of the 2015–16 season.
